introduction: SYNOPSISSi-wuk is preparing for the college entrance exam after failing it in his first try. When his neighbors, Yun-ho, Ji-hi and their family go on a vacation, their aunt Hye-bin watches the house. Si-wuk is drawn to Hye-bin. One day, Hye-bin seduces Si-wuk and they make love when Yun-ho witnesses their lovemaking. Hye-bin's attitude changes abruptly. Yun-ho and Si-wuk get into a fight and Yun-ho suffers a fatal wound. Si-wuk is given two years. After he gets out of prison, Si-wuk goes looking for Hye-bin for he is unable to forget her. Hye-bin's life has fallen into corruption. As Hye-bin still doesn't take Si-wuk seriously, he falls into despair. Later, he hears of her death. Standing by her grave, Si-wuk remembers the past times he had with her. Filled with terrible grief, Si-wuk grows up and becomes a mature man.故事张淑贞是一个失去母亲而失去的年轻人。隔壁是Moon Tae-tae先生，他的家人允浩，还有Ji-hee。希克的母亲对于姬熙的情人叶斌感兴趣，后者去了一趟空荡荡的房子。惠彬感觉到郑的对惠彬的感情。不过，虽然这场斗争中允浩和siuk hyebin一个打开当场交易的态度siuk一个致命的错误认识接受两年的监禁。两年后，十五岁仍与惠彬见面，发现慧姬遇见了她。但她厌倦了siuk而让另一个拉允浩允浩却愿意追逐siuk似乎是悲剧的起因另一个人让原谅siuk。仿旧hyebin变成了一个丑陋的职业和谁住siuk帕里女人是由大人听到死亡hyebin的消息saegimyeo回先前的坟墓hyebin的记忆的过程。
